title: The U.S. Senate candidate prefers a woman's right to make dinner for him?
subtitle: "An unstoppable feminized campaign against manhood," Senate candidate GOP said that he supported the right of women to become traditional homemakers.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Republican candidate for the U.S. Senate of Missouri, Kurtland Sykes, said that he "supports women's rights," but not if that means that women become "obsessed girls giving up household life and children."
